tool_description: High-performance API for rewriting and paraphrasing any of your or ChatGPT text, making it plagiarism free
name: Paraphrasing and Rewriter API
title: Paraphrasing and Rewriter API

api_list.name: Rewrite hard
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://paraphrasing-and-rewriter-api.p.rapidapi.com/rewrite-hard"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "paraphrasing-and-rewriter-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
